name: Spiderman vs Doctor Octopus Fight Game
name_original: Spiderman vs Doctor Octopus Fight Game
description:
Spider-Man and the Doctor are fighting. The doctor is launching a rocket. Spiderman throws web. Let's see how many minutes will you withstand these attacks? You can go left and right with the buttons at the bottom and you can shoot by touching the screen. To play from the computer, play with the A and D movement keys or mouse click.

You can go left and right with the buttons at the bottom and you can shoot by touching the screen. While playing from the computer, you can shoot with the mouse while going left and right with the a and d keys.
